# unifi_wifi_broadcasts (Data Source)

Fetches the list of WiFi broadcasts (SSIDs) for a site.

## Schema

### Required

- `site_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `broadcasts` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--broadcasts))
